ygData.subject: Escape!
ygData.msgSnippet: * Zyber watches as DeathScythe walked about a dozen or more feet from her, not liking the sound of his laughter as he looked back at her. He wasn t finished

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>

* Zyber watches as DeathScythe walked about a dozen or more feet from her, 
not liking the sound of his laughter as he looked back at her.
He wasn't finished with her yet was he?
There was something else in store for her yet.

Zyber watches in fear as DeathScythe took up his gun and aimed it, closing 
her optics and afraid that he was about to shoot her this time, only to open 
them in realization then the rockfalls she was hearing was him sealing up 
the other two passages!!
No! There would be no other clear way out of this cavern then!

Zyber whimperes as she tried with her might to heave herself to her feet, 
holding her sides as she got up and looked towards DeathScythe.
She growled plaintivly at his words.

She closed and covered her optics as he blasts open the exit again, only to 
feel a wash of cold air swamp into the cavern.
Zyber then opened her optics to see DeathScyther walk out of the cave, 
giving it everything she had to move quickly and try and get out also. Even 
if it meant being with him again in the same situation.
It wasn't hard to know that he was going to seal up the hole again, and just 
as she broke into a run, so close to the enterance he fired.
However, with a cringe she dove just under the blast, rolling out right into 
the back legs of DeathScythe.
She hit hard against them, but at least she was out of the cave.
But there was still the threat that DeathScythe just might fall back against 
her now...because she had struck the back of his knees!*
